channel.title: Just wondering
channel.description: how do people get special titles? Like "Graphics master" "C# Master" "Java Guru" "website master" Ect.

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:21, topic:367550”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=463705.msg3394669#msg3394669 date=1289250405]

I got a gang o.o Cause I am a E thug.

am i a part of it
[/quote]<3 yeah lol and damn I haven’t been on much lately! must make my post back >:D

But don’t you have to like show off your work and knowledge by releasing stuff?[/quote]
That and not be a “idiot” to them at least. Thus it being good enough for them to like it.

Read full topic

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I was trying to learn once, it was my first step in the world of programming (cheesy, I know) so I made a Visual Basic autotyper, only to have it ripped to pieces the the moparisthebest-arians.

Read full topic

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:10, topic:367550”][quote author=jme link=topic=463705.msg3392428#msg3392428 date=1289071178]

how do people get special titles?
Like
“Graphics master”
“C# Master”
“Java Guru”
“website master”
Ect.

Mainly earned on MITB, they are given to those who have an exceeding talent in those areas and have contributed to the community with that individual skill.

They can be earned here too.

Barely.

Well thats more or less the users fault here. Anyone who meets the requirements will get a reward.
[/quote]

How is it the users fault that the moment a user tries to show off his skills at moparisthebest (either to show what they already know, or to try and learn more) they get shoved back over here.[/quote]

You don’t need to go to mitb to earn the awards. Earn them here if you want.

Mitb forums won’t push anyone away trying to learn as long as they try to help themselves first. I don’t know what you are talking about. If you come across a crusty person there ignore them instead of making it worse.

Read full topic

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I don’t know about that part, but over at Moparisthebest, people are much smarter than here. At least because the fact of the community that is ran, while over here is RSPS. So I mean it’s going over other things, intelligent debate etc – no flaming needed.

Read full topic
